results.content: The tutor has a simple and clear language.
results.content_html: The tutor has a simple and clear language.

results.content:
This is an excellent course that delivers on many fronts. John presents the material in a crisp and clear manner.  It wins on the quality of the instruction, the structure of course and the length of the videos. 
He does assume that you already have some foundation - but he sets those expectations from the onset.  If you looking for a concise and methodical guide to deploying a Django App on Linux - then I would recommend this course.
results.content_html:
This is an excellent course that delivers on many fronts. John presents the material in a crisp and clear manner. It wins on the quality of the instruction, the structure of course and the length of the videos.
He does assume that you already have some foundation - but he sets those expectations from the onset. If you looking for a concise and methodical guide to deploying a Django App on Linux - then I would recommend this course.
